judicialResults.label: Remand In care of Local Authority
judicialResults.resultText:
RILA - Remand In care of Local Authority
Remand In care of Local Authority until hearing on 31/01/2025 at 10:00, Birmingham Crown Court in accommodation provided by the local authority for Birmingham City Council. Consents not to be produced until 02/01/2025. Basis: Proceedings under the Extradition Act 2003. Bail exceptions: To prevent interference with witnesses or otherwise obstruct the course of justice, whether in relation to the defendant or any other person. Reasons for applying: Offended on bail, Additional reasons. Conditions imposed on the defendant: The curfew condition will be electronically monitored. The electronic monitoring service will see that the curfew is complied with. You will wear a personal identification device at all times during the terms of this condition. You must not remove or tamper with the monitoring equipment in any way. You must allow access for the monitoring staff to complete the induction process and follow any reasonable instructions they give you., Must: 48 London Wall, City of London, London EC2M 5QB, Must not go within 2miles of 48 London Wall, City of London, London EC2M 5QB. Reasons for Conditions: For enquiries to be made and to prepare a report to the court for the next hearing. Requirements imposed on local authority: Requirements imposed on Local Authority. Further requirements: Further requirements.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Rydych wedi’ch remandio yng ngofal yr Awdurdod Lleol

judicialResults.label: Sent to Crown Court for trial in Local Authority Accommodation
judicialResults.resultText:
CCIILA - Sent to Crown Court for trial in Local Authority Accommodation
Sent for trial under Section 51(1) & (2)(b) of the Crime and Disorder Act 1998. Indicated plea: Guilty. Bail remand days to count (tagged days): 23. A direction under section 45 of the Youth Justice and Criminal Evidence Act 1999 was made on 21/01/2025. No direction under section 45 of the Youth Justice and Criminal Evidence Act 1999 was made. Trial issues identified: 48 London Wall, City of London,. Directions made: 48 London Wall, City of London,. No indication given re victim personal statement. Additional considerations re: victim personal statement: Additional considerations re victim personal statement. PSR ordered. Remand In care of Local Authority until hearing on a Date and time to be fixed, Birmingham Crown Court in accommodation provided by the local authority for Birmingham City Council. Basis: Consents to further remands being heard in absence. Bail exceptions: Offence while on bail. Reasons for applying: Broken bail conditions. Custody time limit expires on 31/01/2025. Time spent in custody: 60.
judicialResults.welshLabel: Traddodwyd chi i Lys y Goron ar gyfer treial mewn llety Awdurdod Lleol
